page.description: Returns the number of times word occurs in string.
page.syntax: Count as N = occurs_words(C word ,C string [,C delimiter ])

argument.name: string
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of words to examine. Character

page.discussion: OCCURS_WORDS() returns the number of times word appears in string.
page.example: dim cs as C cs = form_objects_get("Category_Form") cs -> SUBCATEGORY SUBCATEGORY_LBL CATEGORY CATEGORY_LBL ID ID_LBL Tables Tables:CATEGORY num = occurs_words("CATEGORY", cs, crlf() ) num -> 1.000000
